channel.title: Stephen McGuire on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: The impact of Covid-19 on disability sports
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan GM - Gavin Macleod SM - Stephen McGuire MM Now on this podcast we’re going to be looking at the ways disability sport in Scotland has been affected by the coronavirus. So first up I spoke to Gavin Macleod. He is the chief executive of Scottish Disability Sport. Okay, so now we’re joined by Gavin Macleod, the Chief Executive of Scottish Disability Sport. So, Gavin, just kind of like give us an overview.
